channel.title: Redis on Linuxkai 的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Redis on Linuxkai 的博客

item.title: Redis集群部署
item.description: 需要的机器 redis01:192.168.112.152 redis02:192.168.112.153 redis03:192.168.112.154 部署说明： 每台机器装两个节点(端口分别6379,6380，一主一备) redis都安装到了/srv/redis-cluster 配置文件放在了 /srv/redis-cluster/conf 日志文件放在 /srv/redis-cluster/log 编译redis tar xf redis-5.0.0.tar.gz cd redis-5.0.0 make make install

item.title: Redis 批量清除Key
item.description: 批量清除key 命令 ./redis-cli -h bigdata.lpntvo.ng.0001.apne1.cache.amazonaws.com -p 6379 keys "position*" | xargs ./redis-cli -h bigdata.lpntvo.ng.0001.apne1.cache.amazonaws.com -p 6379 del
